navbar.belowHeader: A cup of tea is a cup of peace !

aboutusPage.headerContent: Our mission at CHAI MINAR is simple: to serve you the perfect cup of tea. We are dedicated to sourcing the finest tea leaves and creating a serene environment where you can unwind and enjoy the rich flavors and aromas of our carefully curated tea selection. Experience the essence of tranquility with every sip at Chaiminar.
aboutusPage.belowHeaderContent: At Chaiminar, we are on a mission to redefine the tea experience. With a passion for quality and a dedication to excellence, we strive to provide you with the finest teas from around the world. Join us as we create a sanctuary of flavors, where you can indulge in the art of tea and find tranquility in every sip.

AddressContent: Plot No. 50, Sri Laxmi Nagar Colony, Manikonda Jagir, Telangana 500089
